title: PLECS 3.7 – Time-domain simulation of power electronic systems
content: PLECS Standalone is an autonomous software package for time-domain simulation of power electronic systems. If independence from other simulation platforms is important, PLECS Standalone provides the all-in-one solution for modeling complex electrical circuits and sophisticated controls in a single environment.   Due to its optimized engine, PLECS Standalone runs much faster than PLECS Blockset. title: GIFQuickMaker 1.5.0 – Make animated GIFs
content: GIFQuickMaker allows you to create GIFs, then combine them with TIFF, BMP, PNG and JPEG images.   Version 1.5.0: OS X 10.9 or later   Intel, 64-bit processor OS X 10.6.6 or later

title: SendOff 1.2.3 – Shipping label and USPS postage software for online sellers
